part.Name: Description
part.Short: The tall form bears a grandios display as =pronouns.possessive= antlers enbolden =pronouns.possessive= stature. =pronouns.Possessive= hands form sharp claws designed for carving out burrows, and what could be percieved as feet take the form of sharp hooks.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The carapace protects the body as wings emerge. A horn protrudes from the pinacle of =pronouns.possessive= rostrum, as though the bone combined was fused. =pronouns.Possessive= plant-like flesh hidden by thick layers of fur, as =pronouns.subjective= bask the day's light.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: At a distance one can see =pronouns.possessive= blazing frill racing in the night. =pronouns.Possessive= galloping run hastened by the heat around =pronouns.subjective=, as the adrenaline running through =pronouns.possessive= veins warms their blood.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The icy bill gives these wayfarers a calm, but welcoming demeanor. =pronouns.Possessive= short-sightedness, is a mere side effect of =pronouns.possessive= psionic will, ensuring =pronouns.subjective==verb:'re:afterpronoun= never alone.
